recipe.name: Painkillers
recipe.notes: Dad Beck was famous for making this in large batches and for a long while it was considered something of a state secret.  I believe that these measures were largely relaxed by 2005 or so, written recipes being spotted "in the open" around the Bryan household a time or two with D.B. allowing them to be copied so long as the key ingredient is obscured.  It is reproduced here in the interests of its longevity.
recipe.preparation: Mix liquid ingredients, pour over ice and serve with a dashing of nutmeg.  Drink until pain goes away.
recipe.source_name: Dad Beck provided this recipe he obtained on a Carribean cruise.
